column4: I'm trying to convert my Ubuntu 10.04 Desktop to NBR. I did "sudo apt-get install ubuntu-netbook" and it installed all the packages, but how do I switch to the NBR interface? Thanks
you just gotta find out what the components are named and add it to startup applications. i think its netbook-launcher and maximus
isn't available a simple tool that allow me to easily switch between the two interfaces?
